amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the $404 million in funding for the National Bio- and Agro-Defense Facility (NBAF) planned for Manhattan, KS, and to apply the savings to the deficit reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to eliminate the National Bio- and Agro-defense facility and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bishop (NY) amendment (A019) Failed by recorded vote: 80 - 345 (Roll no. 199).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Bishop (NY) amendment (A019) Failed by recorded vote: 80 - 345 (Roll no. 199).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A019) offered by Mr. Bishop (NY).
